name: Fire Youth Academy
description: The Youth Academy meets every Saturday from 9:00 a.m. to 1:00 p.m. at the San Francisco Black Firefighters Association Headquarters, 4936 Third Street, in San Francisco. Some of the firefighting skills taught include: - Basic Emergency Care - Fire Prevention - Forcible Entry - Scene Safety - Search and Rescue - Self-Contained Breathing Apparatus Application
